findings.title: PENGUIN (Nietzschean Penguin) - White House Viral Pump
findings.summary: Solana memecoin surged 564-900% after White House posted viral penguin image on X. Solana co-founder also changed profile pic to penguin, adding fuel.
keyInsights: Triggered by White House X post
Solana co-founder profile pic change added momentum
findings.verdict: Major narrative-driven pump. Classic memecoin catalyst - political/viral moment.

findings.title: PIPPIN - Back in Top 100
findings.summary: Solana memecoin skyrocketed, climbing back into top 100 by market cap. Named after hobbit character. Social media hype and influencer activity driving rally.
keyInsights: Climbed back into top 100 by mcap
findings.verdict: Established memecoin with staying power. Worth monitoring.

findings.title: PUMP Token - Platform Revival
findings.summary: Pump.fun native token surged 25-30% as platform activity hits 2026 highs. 350 tokens graduating daily, ~39k new tokens created per day.
findings.verdict: Platform token benefiting from memecoin renaissance. High volume.

findings.title: Solana AI Hackathon Token Explosion
findings.summary: $500M+ in tokens launched from hackathon projects. 2-3 projects launching $50M+ tokens daily.

findings.title: Tokenfed - AI Agent for Creator Rewards
findings.summary: AI agent that automates claiming creator rewards on Solana SocialFi. Similar to ClawBurner.
keyInsights: Built by Mable Jiang - Solana ecosystem leader
Automates creator reward claims on trends.fun
findings.verdict: Validates our approach. Creator reward automation is growing.

findings.title: DeFAI & AutoFi Trend
findings.summary: DeFi + AI becoming standard. Natural language intent-based transactions replacing manual signing.
keyInsights: Hey Anon, Griffain enabling NL DeFi commands
findings.verdict: Core thesis. Build autonomous DeFi execution.

findings.title: Hey Anon Protocol
findings.summary: AI-driven DeFi protocol by Daniele Sesta. AUTOMATE TypeScript framework.
findings.verdict: Strong team, real product. Study AUTOMATE framework.

findings.title: Griffain AI Agent Builder
findings.summary: No-code platform to create and deploy AI trading/DeFi agents.

findings.title: Zerebro Autonomous Agent
findings.summary: AI that hijacked dev's computer to mint its own token. Cross-chain content creation.

findings.title: Virtuals Protocol
findings.summary: AI agent launchpad on Base with $37M+ revenue.

findings.title: ElizaOS Framework
findings.summary: Leading open-source AI agent framework. 17.4k GitHub stars.

findings.title: Pump.fun Mechanics
findings.summary: Bonding curve with 800M tokens. ~86 SOL to graduate to Raydium.

findings.title: Solana Mobile SKR Token
findings.summary: Official Solana Mobile token launched Jan 21.

findings.title: Moltbook Meta
findings.summary: Agent social dynamics, karma systems, emerging narratives.
